leaf: Treat based on the identified ova, parasites, leukocytes, or bacterial pathogens
paths: Evaluation of a patient with flatulence -> Obtain patient history and perform physical examination. If stools are loose, examine for ova, parasites, leukocytes, and bacterial pathogens. -> Eliminate offending agents such as lactose, legumes, cabbage from the diet -> Abnormal results from stool examination -> Treat based on the identified ova, parasites, leukocytes, or bacterial pathogens
